This page contains materials by for a lecture on Shiny apps, taught as part of an Experience Sharing and Training Workshop, held 
25 & 26 May 2023 in Addis Ababa and organized by [APHREA-DST](https://www.aphrea-dst.org). 

Much of this lecture draws from [P8105](https://p8105.com).
